INFOGRAPHIC Telehealth trends for hospitals and health systems Image Clinician at computer As we pored over the data from our 2021 benchmark study, it became clear that telehealth was more than just a differentiator—it’s a requirement. Patient experiences, member engagement and clinician satisfaction all benefit from a dedicated and powerful virtual care platform.
We’ve pulled together some of our key insights from the study into an easily digestible infographic for you to share with your peers.
